name: Truworth Wellness
description: Truworth holds an industry experience of over 5 years of implementing successful wellness programs across various top organizations across India. Our mission is to help you gain a competitive edge by promoting a culture of health & wellbeing throughout your organization. Truworth Wellness was founded in 2011 with the core mission of promoting the culture of preventive wellness across various organizations. We started off by providing employee health checkups & biometric screenings and slowly diversified into providing a complete end to end employee health benefits solution.
Headline: India’s #1 Holistic Corporate Wellness Company
ShortDescription: Truworth Wellness provides Innovative employee wellness engagement programs & employee assistance programs.

enhanced_description: Truworth Wellness, founded in 2011 and headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka, is positioned as India's #1 Holistic Corporate Wellness Company. With over 5 years of industry experience in implementing successful wellness programs across top organizations in India, it specializes in promoting a culture of preventive wellness and health & wellbeing. The platform offers innovative employee wellness engagement programs and employee assistance programs, providing a complete end-to-end employee health benefits solution. Key features include Pharmacy Reimbursements, Health Checks, and Mental Wellness. The platform also offers Health Risk & Immunity Assessments, allows users to set personalized Wellness Goals with suggested steps, and provides comprehensive Vitals & Wellness Trackers for various health metrics such as sleep, steps, mood, blood sugar, BP, Cholesterol, and Thyroid.
